text: Is it possible to get VSCode to sync with Codecov to see what lines aren't covered?

elements.text: Is it possible to get VSCode to sync with Codecov to see what lines aren't covered?

text: If you have Coverage.jl installed in your environment, and then you run the `Tasks: Run test task` command and select the option with coverage information, _and_ you have the `Coverage Gutters` VS Code extension installed, then you should see coverage information in VS Code :slightly_smiling_face:

elements.text: If you have Coverage.jl installed in your environment, and then you run the
command and select the option with coverage information,
VS Code extension installed, then you should see coverage information in VS Code

text: I'm going to open a PR that removes the need to have Coverage.jl installed now.
